title: BRIEF-Kerala Ayurveda gets shareholders' nod for medicine sale deal with Ayurvedagram Heritage Wellness Centre
author: Reuters Staff
description: * Gets shareholders' nod for deal with Ayurvedagram Heritage Wellness Centre for sale of medicines worth up to 50 million rupees Source text: http://bit.ly/2xMqWvO Further company coverage:
cleaned_text: Sept 28 (Reuters) - Kerala Ayurveda Ltd: * Gets shareholders' nod for deal with Ayurvedagram Heritage Wellness Centre for sale of medicines worth up to 50 million rupees Source text: [bit.ly/2xMqWvO](http://bit.ly/2xMqWvO) Further company coverage:
